body.name: Mop Replace Head [ 3 Pack ] Mop Refills Compatible with Triangle Spin Mop, 100% Microfiber, Deep Cleaning Machine Washable and Easy-to-Replace
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 4 mins
features: Δ Exact fit for spin mop _ Not only the triangle base but also the bucket. Installation as easy as original which is easily detach and snap on perfectly! NOTE: Fit for 1-Tank system only. Not compatible with 2-Tanks Rinse Clean system.

Δ Making mop much easier _ Mopping the floor is not really “easy”, but these mop heads can make cleaning floors a breeze! Just cleans by doing two passes: one to wet the floor and loosen grime, and the other to dry, no streaking or water spots. Also it's light weight and wields effortlessly. Great for quick mop ups!

Δ For hard floor surfaces clean _ It’s a good cleaner for mopping up mud and dog prints. You can use them on hardwood, vinyl and ceramic/ tile floors, etc. Rooms like kitchen, hall, dining room and bathrooms.

Δ Machine-washable and reusable _ These microfiber mop replace heads are machine-washable and easy cleaning which will release your hands after a laborious housework. Just pot it into wash machine and air dry it, then you can refresh and reuse for a cleaner clean. Economical and environmentally!
Δ Material _ 100% Microfiber, Polyester | Package Quantity: 3 Pack

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable & Last a long while!
reviews.reviewText: I am thrilled with my purchase of the Homsis 6 Pack Mop Replace Heads compatible with the O Cedar EasyWring Spin Mop. These mop refills have proven to be an absolute game-changer in keeping my floors spotless and gleaming.The 100% microfiber construction is top-notch, ensuring a deep and thorough cleaning with every swipe. I appreciate the attention to detail in the design, making these replace heads not only effective but also machine washable, adding an extra layer of convenience to my cleaning routine.The compatibility with the O Cedar EasyWring Spin Mop is seamless, and the installation process is a breeze. The secure fit prevents any slipping or detachment during use, allowing me to clean with confidence.What sets these mop refills apart is their longevity. They withstand regular use and are incredibly durable, proving to be a cost-effective solution in the long run. The ability to switch between the six replace heads ensures I always have a clean one ready for action.The deep-cleaning power combined with the ease of replacement makes these Homsis mop heads a must-have for anyone using the O Cedar EasyWring Spin Mop. I highly recommend them to fellow Amazon shoppers looking for a reliable and efficient solution to keep their floors in tip-top condition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mop heads work great!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to try as a replacement for the name brand ones as they aren’t cheap for just one. These work great. Good material and It’s even nice they send an extra head but I didn’t need it. They fit my O-cedar head attachment with no problems. It never fell off. I will definitely be buying these from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Review of the Perfect-Fit Spin Mop Replacement Heads
reviews.reviewText: These spin mop replacement heads are a game-changer for household cleaning, fitting perfectly with our specific mop model and bucket. Their triangle design and easy installation make them a convenient choice. The standout feature is their washability, which not only makes them environmentally friendly but also economically savvy. Each head cleans efficiently with minimal effort, effectively tackling mud and pet prints on various hard floor surfaces like hardwood, vinyl, and ceramic. The three-pack extends their usability, offering a long-term cleaning solution that's both effective and practical.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Might like these more than the actual brand replacements...
reviews.reviewText: Only downside to these is that I feel like they can be trickier to get to snap on then the original. Besides that, I really like these, I feel like they cover more surface area and hold up better in the wash after use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EVERY BIT AS GOOD AS THE BRAND NAME
reviews.reviewText: We have been using this mop for three years. A few days ago the bead broke. I thought I would have to replace the whole thing. But I was able to buy this replacement. The head with six mops is a great deal. I have used it and, if anything, it is more absorbent that the original. Washed out beautifully. And I am able to use the original bucket and handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent replacement for original mop
reviews.reviewText: Yes, I bought the original style mop, and this fits and works on my mop just as the original mop did. Happy to have found a much cheaper option. Have mopped with it several times already and have had no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfect, great price point
reviews.reviewText: Works exactly as advertised! I’ve been using this mop since it first came out in 2010 I think.. I love that I can throw the mop heads in the washer and hang to air dry.. YES.. air dry on a dollar tree, flimsy, over the door, “hanging thingy.”Bit of advice, don’t clean your mop heads with bleach.. it will give them ( and any mop) a mildew smell.. if I need to soak mine, I use boiling water from my electric kettle IN my CLEAN mop bucket with oxi-clean! Works like a charm!Also, these mop heads are for the ORIGINAL O’Cedar mop head. The new style has a smaller mop head than the original ( in case you were wondering this difference)Hope my review helps!Disclaimer: No, I wasn’t paid, bribed, or given anything FREE for my honest review AND helpful tips!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve bought these twice and love them! I have 3 dogs so my floors stay dirty and these always do the job to get them clean!
Son exactamente iguales que el que venía con el trapeador y a súper precio
